verses.verse: And it shall come to pass <WH1697>, when all these things are come <WH935> upon thee <WH1293>, the blessing and the curse <WH7045>, which I have set <WH5414> before <WH6440> thee <WH7725>, and thou shalt call them to mind <WH3824> among all the nations <WH1471>, whither Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath driven thee <WH5080>,

and shalt return <WH7725> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and shalt obey <WH8085> his voice <WH6963> according to all that I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, thou and thy children <WH1121>, with all thy heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>;

that then Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will turn <WH7725> thy captivity <WH7622>, and have compassion <WH7355> upon thee <WH7725>, and will return and gather <WH6908> thee from all the peoples <WH5971>, whither Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath scattered thee <WH6327>.

If any of thine outcasts <WH5080> be in the uttermost <WH7097> parts of heaven <WH8064>, from thence will Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> gather <WH6908> thee <WH3947>, and from thence will he fetch thee:

and Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will bring <WH935> thee into the land <WH776> which thy fathers <WH1> possessed <WH3423>, and thou shalt possess <WH3423> it <WH3190>; and he will do thee good, and multiply <WH7235> thee above thy fathers <WH1>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will circumcise <WH4135> thy heart <WH3824>, and the heart <WH3824> of thy seed <WH2233>, to love <WH157> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> with all thy heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>, that thou mayest live <WH2416>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will put <WH5414> all these curses <WH423> upon thine enemies <WH341>, and on them that hate <WH8130> thee <WH7291>, that persecuted thee.
And thou shalt return <WH7725> and obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and do <WH6213> all his commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will make thee plenteous <WH3498> in all the work <WH4639> of thy hand <WH3027>, in the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, for good <WH2896>: for Jehovah <WH3068> will again <WH7725> rejoice <WH7797> over thee for good <WH2896>, as he rejoiced <WH7797> over thy fathers <WH1>;

if thou shalt obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which are written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451>; if thou turn <WH7725> unto Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> with all thy heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>.
For this commandment <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, it is not too hard <WH6381> for thee <WH7350>, neither is it far off.

It is not in heaven <WH8064>, that thou shouldest say <WH559>, Who shall go up <WH5927> for us to heaven <WH8064>, and bring <WH3947> it unto us <WH8085>, and make us to hear it <WH6213>, that we may do it?

Neither is it beyond <WH5676> the sea <WH3220>, that thou shouldest say <WH559>, Who shall go <WH5674> over <WH5676> the sea <WH3220> for us <WH3947>, and bring it unto us <WH8085>, and make us to hear it <WH6213>, that we may do it?
But the word <WH1697> is very <WH3966> nigh <WH7138> unto thee <WH6310>, in thy mouth, and in thy heart <WH3824>, that thou mayest do it <WH6213>.
See <WH7200>, I have set <WH5414> before <WH6440> thee this day <WH3117> life <WH2416> and good <WH2896>, and death <WH4194> and evil <WH7451>;

in that I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117> to love <WH157> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in his ways <WH1870>, and to keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> and his ordinances <WH4941>, that thou mayest live <WH2421> and multiply <WH7235>, and that Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> may bless <WH1288> thee in the land <WH776> whither thou goest <WH935> in to possess it <WH3423>.
But if thy heart <WH3824> turn away <WH6437>, and thou wilt not hear <WH8085>, but shalt be drawn away <WH5080>, and worship <WH7812> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and serve them <WH5647>;

I denounce <WH5046> unto you this day <WH3117>, that ye shall surely <WH6> perish <WH6>; ye shall not prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> in the land <WH127>, whither thou passest over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> to go <WH935> in to possess it <WH3423>.

I call <WH5749> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776> to witness <WH5749> against you this day <WH3117>, that I have set <WH5414> before <WH6440> thee life <WH2416> and death <WH4194>, the blessing <WH1293> and the curse <WH7045>: therefore choose <WH977> life <WH2416>, that thou mayest live <WH2421>, thou and thy seed <WH2233>;

to love <WH157> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to obey <WH8085> his voice <WH6963>, and to cleave <WH1692> unto him <WH2416>; for he is thy life, and the length <WH753> of thy days <WH3117>; that thou mayest dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH127> which Jehovah <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1>, to Abraham <WH85>, to Isaac <WH3327>, and to Jacob <WH3290>, to give them <WH5414>.
